message:
Did you for a moment doubt the puissance of the Africa Rising rhetoric? There can be no better evidence to this new paradigm than seeing young Africans taking on the baton.
Today, we congratulate our alum, former ASA Vice President and pioneer of the Africa Learning Circle, Hassan Kane, on his appointment on the advisory board of the African Development University-ADU, a Pan-African university in Niger with the aim of training the next generation of African game-changers. Read more on his page:
https://www.facebook.com/hassan.kane.7/posts/10213325279903998
